meta.name: Alexey Kropachev
meta.title: Senior Playable Ads Developer · Team Lead

summary: Senior Playable Ads Developer with 5+ years of experience in gamedev and adtech, combining hands-on production (Cocos Creator, CreateJS) with pipeline design, asset optimization and cross-functional leadership. Strong creative sensibility and player-first approach: I turn game assets and concepts into compact, high-quality interactive ads, build in-house production processes, and mentor teams to deliver repeatable results.

responsibilities: Full-cycle production of playable ads using Cocos Creator: concept, prototyping, build, delivery.
3D asset work in Blender: model optimization, UV baking, texture setup and simple animation work.
UI/UX design and rapid prototyping for short interactive experiences.
Asset optimization: atlasing, spritesheet generation, LOD, texture compression strategies.
Localization readiness and dynamic language support for UI and in-play text.
Adaptation of builds to ad networks (size limits, autoplay/mute rules).
Close collaboration with marketing and analytics: tracking KPIs, generating hypotheses and test variants.
achievements: Designed and implemented an in-house playable production pipeline with templates and checklists.
Authored developer and QA guides that standardized builds and reduced rework.
Assembled a playable-ready asset library from game resources, accelerating prototyping.
Delivered 10 high-quality playable creatives (excluding minor A/B / geo variants).

responsibilities: Scriptwriting and creative concepting for short ad flows (5–30s focus).
3D modelling, retopology and texture baking for web performance.
2D frame-by-frame animation and spritesheet production.
Mechanics and interaction prototyping (Cocos Creator / TypeScript).
Asset packaging and optimization for ad networks.
Localization and multi-language builds.
Weekly competitor benchmarking: deconstruction calls, extracting technical and narrative techniques and turning them into testable hypotheses.
Mentoring junior developers and coordinating designers and animators.
achievements: Led transition of playable production to full 3D, improving visual fidelity.
Defined pipeline and specification templates (TЗ) that reduced handoff friction.
Introduced TypeScript and internal best practices for Cocos Creator builds.
Established recurring competitive analysis sessions feeding ideation & test roadmap.

responsibilities: Produced 2D HTML5 playables and animated banners (CreateJS / Adobe Animate).
Wrote micro-scripts and scenarios for short ad formats.
Performed hand-drawn frame-by-frame animation and spritesheet assembly.
Adapted creatives to ad networks and different placements (responsive/fixed sizes).
Basic asset optimization to meet strict size and performance budgets.
achievements: Delivered multiple interactive banners and playable proofs while consistently meeting size budgets.
Built competence in manual animation pipelines that later informed 3D transitions.

earlier_experience.notes: Outdoor advertising design and client consulting.
Led 4 people, implemented CRM, halved turnaround times for repeat clients.

hobbies: Playing and analysing games (roguelikes, RPGs, strategy) — source of inspiration for mechanics.
Digital painting and illustration — participated in themed art contests.
Experimenting with small tech demos and physics effects for short interactive creatives.

additional.availability: Open to remote and hybrid roles; open to relocation for the right opportunity.
